name: Pasta Primavera Frittata
description: Go meatless once per week. Only 10 minutes to prep and 25 to bake for an easy weeknight meal.
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, cook pasta according to package directions.
In a large mixing bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, 3 Onion Dip Mix and Pesto Sauce Mix. Stir in pasta, broccoli and tomato. Season with Salt and Pepper. Set aside.
Lightly spray frying pan with vegetable oil and heat over medium heat. Pour egg mixture into pan, stirring with a spatula for 1 minute.
Reduce heat to medium-low and cook for 6â€“8 minutes. The sides and bottom should be firm, and the top slightly runny.
Sprinkle with Parmesan and place under the broiler for 3 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve.
